description: Meet the Chillos Sneaker, a sneaker for chill seekers. Designed for when your kickback needs just a little bit more coverage, the Chillos Sneaker is made with a 100% recycled woven upper and 97% recycled laces for relaxation with a sustainable core. Our LUVSEAT™ footbed supports your arches, while our EVA construction is so lightweight these sneakers literally float. Seriously, give it a try. Wear them heel up, or kicked down. Fully washable and fully vegan. No matter how you like to hang, find your way in the Chillos sneaker.
name: Chaco Chillos Sneaker - Mens
